text: Kare-ra wa,`ose ni shitagaimasu.' To iuga, ichido anata no mae kara tachisaru to, anata ga itta no to wa chigatta koto o yomosugara sakubo suru. Daga arra wa kare-ra no shuya no sakubo o kiroku nasa reru. Dakara anata wa kare-ra kara tozakari, arra ni o sugari shi nasai. Makotoni arra wa hogo-sha to shite banzende ara reru
